perturbation.original_text:
4. Fees for Customizations:

[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any "not to exceed" limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]

If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
4. Fees for Customizations:

[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any "not to exceed" limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]

If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clause 'Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder', a contradiction arises. The agreement still discusses potential price increases, implying a financial arrangement, but the condition of receiving a refund is omitted. This creates uncertainty in enforcement as Bank of America's rights upon price increase are now ambiguous.

perturbation.original_text:
1. The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.

No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall deliver to Bank of America the documents described below for this Customization. The detailed specifications so delivered shall be incorporated herein when approved by Bank of America.

System Solution

Functional Specifications

System Design Specifications

 Test Specifications
perturbation.changed_text:
1. The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.

No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall deliver to Bank of America the documents described below for this Customization.

System Solution

Functional Specifications

System Design Specifications

 Test Specifications
perturbation.explanation: By removing the sentence 'The detailed specifications so delivered shall be incorporated herein when approved by Bank of America', we create a contradiction. The agreement mentions the delivery of detailed specifications, suggesting they are crucial. Omitting the clause about incorporation upon approval introduces ambiguity as to their legal standing within the agreement. This impacts enforcement because without formally incorporating specifications, their enforceability is undermined.

perturbation.original_text: 5. Unless otherwise specified herein, the environment for this Customization Is the same as described on Product License Schedule A to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 5. Unless otherwise specified herein, the environment for this Customization Is the same as described on Product License Schedule to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'Schedule A', and not providing the specific name of the new schedule, it makes it difficult to understand where the environment for this customization is described, thus creating a contradiction, since the environment details are not well defined.
